first.title: Born
first.des: Born and raised in the city of Al-Sulaimanya in the iraqi kurdistan

second.title: Finished Highschool
second.des: Finished Highschool in the city of Al-Sulaimanya in the iraqi kurdistan

third.title: Left the country
third.des: Left the country in 2016 searching for a brighter and safer future

fourth.title: Arrived in Germany
fourth.des: In August 2018 i finally arrived in Germany.

fifth.title: Learning German language
fifth.des: I directly started learning German language in 2018-2020 and received level B2 certificate

sixth.title: Self-taught developer journey started
sixth.des: Alongside my german language course i started learning Coding and Programming by myself

seventh.title: Started Apprenticeship
seventh.des: August 2020 i started my apprenticeship as a Software Developer

eighth.title: Opened a YOUTUBE channel
eighth.des: In my home country there almost no resources about Programming or coding in Kurdish language. Thats why i decided to open a YOUTUBE channel (Link you find it social section) in order to share my knowledge and help people who are interested in programming find useful and easy resources to learn and start their journey in this field.
